meanings.definition: A lotion or cream applied to the skin to protect against the sun's harmful rays.
meanings.sent1: I always remember to apply sunscreens before going to the beach.
meanings.sent2: The sunscreens in my bag help prevent sunburn during outdoor activities.
meanings.sent3: The sunscreens in the bottle whispered, 'Don't forget to protect your skin!'
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like sunscreens, shielding me from life's harsh realities.
meanings.sent5: The colorful packaging of the sunscreens made them easy to spot in the store.

meanings.definition: Devices or materials used to block or reduce the amount of sunlight reaching a surface.
meanings.sent1: The tall buildings acted as natural sunscreens for the park below.
meanings.sent2: She installed sunscreens on the windows to keep the room cool.
meanings.sent3: The sunscreens on the roof played hide-and-seek with the sun all day.
meanings.sent4: His words were like sunscreens, shielding her from the harsh truth.
meanings.sent5: The sunscreens on the car windows made the interior much cooler on hot days.
